text: Sambhavatah timro lagi utari'eko allahaka kehi adesa timile chadidinchau ra yasa karanale tapa'iko hrdaya sankucita huncha ki kaphiraharule bhanchan ki unimathi kunai khajana kina utari'ena athava tyasako sathama kunai pharista (svargaduta) kina a'ena. (Sunnus) tapa'i ta matra savadhana garnevala hau ra hareka kurako jim'medari allahamathi cha
